statements: SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE completed = true;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM ProductionSchedule ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM ProductionSchedule GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 500
SELECT id, product_name, production_date FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE completed = false
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS average_quantity FROM ProductionSchedule
SELECT * FROM production_schedules;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM production_schedules WHERE production_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT id, product_name, production_date FROM production_schedules ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM production_schedules;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_count > 0 ORDER BY batch_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_schedules WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM production_schedules GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT product_name, production_date, quantity FROM production_schedules WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT p.product_name, q.defect_count FROM production_schedules p LEFT JOIN quality_control_data q ON p.product_name = q.product_name WHERE q.defect_count IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM production_schedules GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_records DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_schedule WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, ingredient_name, supplier_contact FROM ingredient_suppliers WHERE supplier_id < 5;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM quality_control_data WHERE schedule_id = 3 ORDER BY qc_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE production_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM production_schedule ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, production_date, production_time FROM production_schedule WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT qc_id, test_name, test_result FROM quality_control_data WHERE test_result = 'Pass' AND schedule_id IN (SELECT schedule_id FROM production_schedule WHERE product_name = 'Widget');
SELECT supplier_name, ingredient_name, supplier_contact FROM ingredient_suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, production_date, production_time FROM production_schedule WHERE production_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY production_date, production_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT product_name, production_date, quantity FROM production_schedule WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, product_name FROM quality_control WHERE passed = true;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM ingredient_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_schedule WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM quality_control ORDER BY check_date DESC;
SELECT id, supplier_name, contact_person FROM ingredient_suppliers WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT production_id, product_name FROM production_schedule WHERE production_quantity > 100;
SELECT production_date, production_quantity FROM production_schedule ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE quality_rating >= 4 AND inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employee WHERE employee_salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, production_quantity FROM production_schedule WHERE production_quantity > 100;
SELECT control_id, quality_rating, inspection_date FROM quality_control WHERE quality_rating >= 4 ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, ingredient_quantity, supplier_name FROM ingredients JOIN ingredient_suppliers ON ingredients.supplier_id = ingredient_suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employee WHERE employee_salary > 50000 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
